ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: When trying to sell items that go for quite a bit of cash, look at your customerbase.  Do a /who and see what med/upper level characters are around.  You may
ygData.messageBody:
When trying to sell items that go for quite a bit of cash, look at your
customerbase. Do a /who and see what med/upper level characters are
around. You may want to go to a place where high level characters hang
out as the people in freeport may not be able to afford the luxury of
jewelry. Remember, they are trying to scrape enough money to buy spells
that are in the half plat to 4.5plat range. The desert is pretty close
and farther on to the high hold area and the Karanas you'll find higher
level ppl.

-----Original Message-----
From: Miko, Jeff [mailto:JMiko@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 5:55 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?


From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>

Well I don't know where you get 20p for a Jade ring. I've been trying to
sell Jade Rings in Freeport at 8p each for 2 days now (4 hours play
time). I have NOT sold one damn ring and I have 10 to sell. I'm not
going to waste anymore time trying to sell. I'm going to sell to a
vendor, because I can make more money killing MOB's in 4 hours then
trying to sell rings.




-----Original Message-----
From: Wanderer CommonWealth [mailto:wanderercw@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 5:59 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?


From: Wanderer CommonWealth <wanderercw@...>

Hello Enchanters of Norrath
Just to tell you that Jade rings sell for 20 plat each
I sell em faster at 16-15 plat so Let's not make our
prices too cheap, Because if we do that than people
will expect even cheaper and well that's how normal
expensive things get so cheap. From my studies The +5
mana is mana Regeneration, I mean my +2 mana robe
can't just add 2 mana and when i wear it i notice a
diffrence over time especially with the two +5 mana
rings. So Don't sell at cost or anything unless it's a
really good friend or a guild member.
I wan't to protect our economy (And our money)
Especially those in innoruk which i am on
I am Explorer There
The Wanderer
*May The Wanderer's Show you the way*

--- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> Jewelcraft is not broken. You can get up to skill
> 40 with jade before
> it becomes trivial. Perhaps it went up and you
> didn't notice? Maybe
> you just need to make some more. :)
>
> The going rate for Jaded Silver rings sold to PCs is
> 8P, don't
> undersell them or you'll ruin the business for all
> of us. Sometimes I
> give a 1P discount to people who buy 2. And selling
> to your friends is
> an all together different story anyway.
>
> It cost me probably 50 P to get to skill 40.,
> that's 50 P earned from
> monsters, not including sell back money. I've had
> some serious bad
> luck streaks. lots of failures with jade and pearl.
>
> Q d'E
>
